law.catch_line: Users of publicly owned treatment works required to monitor and report on introduction of incompatible pollutants into the works.
law.text: The cabinet is authorized to apply and to enforce against users of publicly owned treatment works the requirements of monitoring, record keeping and reporting, effluent limitations and pretreatment standards for the introduction into such treatment works of pollutants which interfere with, pass through, or otherwise are incompatible with such treatment works. The cabinet may promulgate such rules and regulations as are necessary to implement this section.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 257, sec. 5, effective June 17, 1978.
